thread.section_title: Hotel le Petit Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Visit and Will Stay Again
thread.title_full: Lovely Visit and Will Stay Again - Review of Hotel le Petit Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: greggcl
title: Lovely Visit and Will Stay Again
text:
I stayed here with my son for two nights. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable.
All the staff were helpful and pleasant and the breakfast was just perfect.
The location to the RER was great and close walking distance to the Latin Quarter restaurants.
Will return with my wife on our next visit.
